alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Jefferson (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:52PM EDT until August 12 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HARRISON...CENTRAL JEFFERSON...SOUTHERN CARROLL... BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 552 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Wintersville, or 8 miles northeast of Cadiz, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Wellsburg, Wintersville, Mingo Junction, Follansbee, Hooverson Heights, Bethany, Hopedale, Smithfield, Franklin, Jewett, Beech Bottom, Brilliant, Richmond, New Alexandria, Bloomingdale, Unionport, Brentwood, and Rockdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio...and northern West Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
